summary: The No Propaganda Act (S. 519) seeks to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit federal funding for the Corporation for Public Broadcasting (CPB). The bill would prevent federal funds from being allocated to the CPB and would prevent the CPB from accepting them. It also rescinds unobligated balances from appropriations acts passed in 2022, 2023, and 2024 allocated to the CPB. Lastly, the bill makes a conforming amendment to the Communications Act.
